description: Numbers of form n=(2^a)*(3^b) (A033845) such that both n-1 and n+1 are primes. Special twin prime averages (A001454).
comments: Subset of A027856. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 05 2008]
example: a(13)=243*4096=995328 and {995327,995329} are twin primes of special form. The next term > p(1000000).
author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 02 2001
extensions: More terms from _William Rex Marshall_, Mar 18 2001
